original_text: The family of Levi will weep by itself. And their wives will weep by themselves. The family of Shimei will weep by itself. And their wives will weep by themselves.
korean_text: 레위의 족속이 따로 하고 그들의 아내들이 따로 하며 시므이의 족속이 따로 하고 그들의 아내들이 따로 하며

sentences.original_text: The family of Levi will weep by itself
And their wives will weep by themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 아내들은 각자 혼자서 울 것이다

sentences.original_text: The family of Shimei will weep by itself
And their wives will weep by themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 아내들은 각자 혼자서 울 것이다
